name: Papo Town Pet Life
summary:
Who doesn’t want a fluffy and furry animal friend? In Papo Town, You could live with not just one, but many of them! Every pet is unique! Playing with so many cute animals and taking good care of them will bring you infinite fun and happiness!
Adopt your favorite animal in Papo Town: Pet Life. Cats, dogs, horses, parrots and even lizards! You have lots of choices! Take your favorite animal to different scenes and explore the fun!
